title: Accessibility problems - Bug 12398
description: I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: Observed Behavior: When launching the Help view on 20020326, Win2K, the tab key does not respond or have any effect.
EB: Expected Behavior: The tab key should navigate through the elements in the Help view without requiring a prior click on a 'live' area.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch the Help view on 20020326, Win2K.
2. Attempt to navigate using the tab key.

Result: The tab key does not have any effect.
